body.header: What will I learn in this unit?

ol.li: complete sentences based on a graph and a table.
complete a report based on a graph and a table with appropriate words and phrases.
read statements based on a table and a graph and decide whether they should be included in a report.
use appropriate verb and noun structures to complete sentences describing trends.
complete a report on a bar chart with verbs in appropriate tenses.
match fractions and ratios to figures in pie charts.
